A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a dumpster fire. Rian Johnson shouldn't be allowed no where near a SW movie ever again. The story was terrible\, the pacing terrible\, the acting mostly terrible\, and the direction was terrible. I honestly think this movie is worse than the prequels and in a close fight for last place with the SW Xmas Special. The more I think about this movie the more angry I get.
